TITLE: Title
WHAT_IS_GOGREEN_APP: What is this GoGreen Cambodia app?
GOGREEN_DEFINITION: GOGREEN Cambodia app is a free tool to engage people into making Cambodia a cleaner and greener place. Everyone can contribute by marking places which are clean by dropping a happy green pin, or marking areas where waste hasn't been cleaner up with an angry red pin. You also have the option to drop a pin in areas where trash bins are necessary.
GOGREEN_PURPOSE: GOGREEN Cambodia app gathers your feedback in order to engage communities, organisations and institutions to join efforts in a more effective waste management system. Together, we can be the change.
HOW_TO_USE_GOGREEN_APP: How can i use this GoGreen Cambodia app?
GOGREEN_USAGE: Login App by using your Facebook account and activate the map service on your phone. Once your are logged in, you can start pinning away. Tell us about the area you live in or simply joint an event, and help us clean this city.
YES_IT_IS_FREE: Yes, this app was developed free of charge thanks to InSTEDD iLabSEA and is free of charge for all.
HOW_CAN_I_ORGANISE_MY_OWN_CLEANUP: How can i organise my own cleanup?
WAY_TO_ORGANISE_OWN_CLEANUP: Please create an event on Facebook and submit the link of the event through our "Events" page. Your event will be inserted into public event list in GoGreen Cambodia, and it can be viewed and joined publicly.
FEEL_FREE_TO_SEND_AN_EMAIL_AT: Feel free to send an e-mail at
YOU_CAN_JOIN_OUR_FACEBOOK_GROUP: You can also join our Facebook Group @GoGreen Cambodia.
GREEN_HELPER_DESCRIPTION: Place pin on map at least 3 times
GREEN_WARRIOR_DESCRIPTION: Place pin on the map at least 10 times
GREEN_HEART_DESCRIPTION: Place pin on map and organize event more than 10 times
GOGREEN_APP_IS_CREATED_BY: GOGREEN Cambodia app is created by GOGREEN Cambodia, a volounteering organization and inSTEDD iLabSEA.
YOU_ARE_NOW_A_MEMBER: You are now a member of our community of eco-warrior
OUR_AIM_IS: Our aim is to make Cambodia greener and cleaner together, and to make this happen, we need your help.
PLACE_THIS_GREEN: Place this green happy pin on the map if you notice an area that is really clean
PLACE_THIS_RED: Place this red angry pin on the map if you notice an area that needs cleaning up
PLACE_THIS_BIN: Place this bin symbol on the map if you notice an area that needs a trash bin
YOU_CAN_ALSO_CREATE_EVENT: You can also create your own cleaning event and invite your friends and family to join.
PLEASE_VISIT_OUR_EVENT_PAGE: And if you simply want to join a clean-up, please visit our EVEMTS page to view our calendar.
THIS_APP_IS_FOR: This app is created for people who want to get involved into making our city cleaner!
WHAT_DO_WANT_TO_DO: What do you want to do?
NO_EVENT: Setup your own events so your friend, family, and other people can join together.
START_TIME_EALIER_THAN_END_TIME: Start time must be ealier than end time.
WHAT_MAP_ICONS_MEAN: what does the icon on the map mean?
HAPPY_ICON_MEANING: If you place a green happy pin on the map, it means you notice an area that is really clean.
SAD_ICON_MEANING: If you place a red sad pin on the map, it means you notice an area that needs cleaning up.
TRASH_ICON_MEANING: If you place a black trash pin on the map, it means you notice an area that needs a trash bin.
IT_TRASH: The place should have a trash bin
